author: Erin L. Allwein and Robert E. Schapire and Yoram Singer
title: Reducing Multiclass to Binary: A Unifying Approach for Margin Classifiers

In the SVM experiments, we skipped Audiology, Isolet, Letter-recognition, Segmentation, and Thyroid because these datasets were either too big to be handled by our current implementation of SVM or contained many nominal features with missing values which are problematic for SVM. All datasets have at least six classes.
